name: International Conference on Mathematical Sciences and Technology 2018 (MathTech 2018)
content: School of Mathematical Sciences, Universiti Sains Malaysia is organizing the International Conference on Mathematical Sciences and Technology 2018 (MathTech 2018) with the theme “Innovative Technologies for Mathematics & Mathematics for Technological Innovation”. We cordially invite you and personnel from your institution to participate in MathTech 2018 from the 10th to the 12th of December 2018, to be held at the Hotel Equatorial Penang, Malaysia. The three-day conference consists of plenary talks, paper presentations, workshops and exhibitions. Papers submitted should be related (but not limited) to the following: Mathematics, Applied Mathematics, Interdisciplinary Mathematics, Mathematics Education, Operations Research, Statistics and Financial Mathematics. All papers presented at MathTech 2018 will be peer-reviewed and considered for publication in the American Institute of Physics (AIP) Conference Proceedings series, indexed in The Conference Proceedings Citation Index (part of Web of Science), Scopus (Elsevier), Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) and Astrophysics Data System (ADS). Come and join us. See you in Penang! Thank you. MathTech 2018 Secretariat
